report: I wrote down a theory and then when through an extraordinary experience. The whole thing is detailed in a 42 page thesis titled Psychoactive Dreams With the Philosopher's Stone. It is the first in a series of essays I am currently working. All of my work is freely available at http://individual.utoronto.ca/ajm/.
